content:
That's a great idea! Fresh ginger is a wonderful addition to chicken soup, and it's a great way to add some anti-inflammatory benefits without irritating your mom's stomach. Starting with a small amount and adjusting to taste is a perfect approach.

Remember, it's all about making small, gentle changes to create a nourishing and comforting meal for your mom. By choosing ingredients that are easy to digest and adding anti-inflammatory compounds like ginger, you're taking great care of her.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope your mom enjoys the soup and that it helps her feel better soon!

Take care, and happy cooking!
